refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies the Lists of Titles to display

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Specifies which Lists of Titles should be printed after the Table of Content. The value is a comma separated list of the LoTs to show. The supported LoTs are "figure", "table", "equation", and "example". The list order represents the LoTs order in the output document.
